meanings.definition: Combine or unite to form one structure or substance.
meanings.sent1: The chef is amalgamating the ingredients to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys amalgamating different colors to create beautiful paintings.
meanings.sent3: The kids were amalgamating their toys to build a giant robot.
meanings.sent4: Her voice and the music were amalgamating into a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The artist was amalgamating various textures to craft a unique sculpture.
